Food & Drink

Taniti Fish House

Taniti Fish House is a quality sit-down restaurant celebrated for its fresh, locally sourced fish, salads, and flavorful rice dishes. Nestled in the heart of the island, this charming eatery offers a warm and inviting atmosphere, perfect for savoring the authentic tastes of Taniti. Guests can enjoy expertly prepared meals that highlight the island's rich fishing heritage, featuring daily catches paired with perfectly seasoned rice and a variety of tropical sides. Whether dining with family, friends, or solo, Taniti Fish House provides a delightful culinary experience that showcases the best of the island’s flavors.

Reserve a Table

Taniti Supermarket

Taniti Supermarket is the island’s premier shopping destination, offering a large, modern space stocked with a wide variety of goods to meet every need. From fresh produce and pantry staples to international brands, the supermarket ensures visitors and locals alike can find what they’re looking for. In addition to everyday essentials, Taniti Supermarket features a selection of local foods, including fresh island fruits, regional spices, and traditional snacks, providing a taste of Taniti’s unique flavors. With its convenient location and extensive inventory, this supermarket makes it easy to shop comfortably and efficiently while exploring the island.

View Website

Taniti Deli

Taniti Deli brings the classic charm of a New York-style deli to the heart of the island, offering a menu of mouthwatering sandwiches crafted with fresh, high-quality ingredients. From towering pastrami on rye to savory turkey clubs and vegetarian delights, every sandwich is made to order and packed with flavor. The deli’s casual and welcoming atmosphere makes it the perfect spot for a quick bite or a leisurely lunch. Whether you’re craving a hearty classic or a unique twist on deli favorites, Taniti Deli delivers a taste of the Big Apple with an island flair.
